venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description: Join AJ Kitt every first and third Sunday for open discussions on Metaphysics and how it can be (or already is) applied to day to day existence. If you want something in your life to change, you have to change something in your life. Metaphysics. This is a completely secular (non-denominational) gathering, so bring your own paradigm and see how it fits in with the rest of the world! Fee is by donation and takes place every first and third Sunday.
item.name: Manifesting What You Want Out of Life
